alert.note: Alert for Kingman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 08 at 3:33AM CDT until July 08 at 7:29AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Ninnescah South Fork near Murdock affecting Kingman County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Ninnescah South Fork near Murdock. * WHEN...From early this morning to early this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs along the right upstream bank affecting pastureland and along left downstream bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.8 feet and rising quickly. - Forecast...The river level is expected to exceed 8 feet early this morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Ninnescah South Fork Murdock 8.0 7.8 Sat 3 am CDT 5.6 4.9 4.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 730 AM CDT.
